name: Ext_R4_Procedure_complication
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Procedure.complication for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Procedure.complication from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Procedure|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period. These are generally tracked separately from the notes, which will typically describe the procedure itself rather than any 'post procedure' issues.
element.comment: `Procedure.complication` maps to R5 `Procedure.complication`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period. These are generally tracked separately from the notes, which will typically describe the procedure itself rather than any 'post procedure' issues.
element.comment: `Procedure.complication` maps to R5 `Procedure.complication`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codes describing complications that resulted from a procedure.
